welcome_message_body: Welcome to White Rock, where charming seaside views and vibrant artistic culture await you. Known for its beautiful beaches and lively art scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Taka's Sushi

restaurants.address: 15214 Pacific Avenue, White Rock BC V4B 1P7

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bellingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Bellingham Airport serves mainly charter flights and smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boundary Bay Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Boundary Bay Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coal Harbour Airport offers a modern and convenient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Floatplane Terminal
terminals.description: The floatplane terminal at Coal Harbour Airport caters to passengers traveling to and from nearby islands and remote destinations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orcas Island Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Orcas Island Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miners Bay Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Springbank Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Springbank Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
